page.title: 13HOUSING
page.content: The area can be divided into three different ages for housing,the oldest being pre 1914.the middle group belonging to the inter war period i.e 1918-1939,and the newest being post war.The oldest group is composed mainly of terraced housing with no gardens and a rear yard to the property,there are some more substantial houses from the same period.The{terraced houses}were for the workers in the local{steel works and the larger properties for the managers.Many of the original terraced housing has been demolished,those remaining have been given a new lease of life,by a{modernisation}programme undertaken by the council.Inter war year housing is mainl{semi-detached brick built with slate roofing.Post war housing is most prominent and is mainly council built.
